fields.label: Logo
fields.name: logo_params
fields.instructions: Change header type depending on the hero background you want to use.

fields.label: Menu Color
fields.name: menu_color
fields.instructions: Change the color of the menu links.

sub_fields.label: Lede
sub_fields.name: ledeModule_lede
sub_fields.instructions: This is the large lede text to begin the section, though not required. Keep this short, ideally, though you can hit return and separate paragraphs if you want.

sub_fields.label: Body
sub_fields.name: ledeModule_body
sub_fields.instructions: Content section. Use this to add copy and paragraphs. Again, this section ideally does not have much content in it. Try to keep it to one paragraph if possible.

sub_fields.label: Layout
sub_fields.name: photoModule_layout
sub_fields.instructions: How many photos do you want in this bitch?

sub_fields.label: Column One Image
sub_fields.name: textModule_col_1_img
sub_fields.instructions: This should likely be a transparent PNG, unless you want to watch the world burn.

sub_fields.label: Column One Title
sub_fields.name: textModule_col_1_title
sub_fields.instructions: Optional. But if you title this column, title the others or we'll all die.

sub_fields.label: Column One Title Link
sub_fields.name: textModule_col_1_url
sub_fields.instructions: Optional: fill this in if you want to link the title someplace.

sub_fields.label: Column Three Title
sub_fields.name: textModule_col_3_title
sub_fields.instructions: Optional. But if you title this column, title the others or we'll all die.

sub_fields.label: Column Three Title Link
sub_fields.name: textModule_col_3_url
sub_fields.instructions: Optional: fill this in if you want to link the title someplace.

sub_fields.label: Column Four Title
sub_fields.name: textModule_col_4_title
sub_fields.instructions: Optional. But if you title this column, title the others or we'll all die.

sub_fields.label: Column Four Title Link
sub_fields.name: textModule_col_4_url
sub_fields.instructions: Optional: fill this in if you want to link the title someplace.

sub_fields.label: Quotation?
sub_fields.name: textFeature_quotation
sub_fields.message: If this is a quotation, this will style the featured text as such.

sub_fields.label: Byline
sub_fields.name: textFeature_byline
sub_fields.instructions: Quote attribution. Link to their social/website if you want too, but use target "_blank".
